decision_conditions: The wording of condition no. 4 of planning permission 234306FUL dated 22.02.2024 shall now be taken to be:
Any mezzanine floor shall remain ancillary to the main research & development use (Use Class E(g)(ii)) of the site and shall at no time be used for any other purposes.

Reason:  To safeguard the retention of the industrial premises in accordance with policy 3.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2021), policy 4A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and policies E4 and E6 of the London Plan (2021).
site_name: Segro Park Fairway Drive, Unit B
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendment to vary Condition 4 due to an error on the original decision notice in relation to planning permission reference 234306FUL dated 22.02.2024 for 'Change of use from (Flexible Use Class B1c, B2 and B8) to Research and Development Use (Class E(g)(ii)); alterations to fenestrations, external plant enclosure, fencing, additional cycle and car parking and associated works'
